name: Scrambled 80s
description:
Scrambled 80s - another #ue4jam #visualart #experiment 

This one made between February 15th and February 19th specifically for the 2019 EpicGames Winter UE4JAM :)

Tools: SideFX Houdini, Blender and UnrealEngine 4

Please consider this a very weak attempt to rekindle specific early 80s retro videogame feels, notably Zaxxon (Konami 1982) and Scramble (Konami 1981) ... this is as far as I managed to get during the jam .. 

It's yet another flight simulator, but this time with weapons and evasive maneuvers.  It's neat, but nowhere near what I had/have planned.  

if you like this, please let me know.. thanks!!
-Organic

https://www.instagram.com/organiccomputer/

Controls:

mouse buttons - fun/fire
A/D - roll left/right
S/W - pitch forward/up
Q/E - minor turn left/right
SHIFT - Turbo mode
ESC - menu/settings/exit
